sqlMap.sql: SELECT A.CouponNo AS couponNo, A.CouponType AS couponType, A.RuleCode AS ruleCode, A.CouponCode AS couponCode, CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.StartTime, 23) AS startTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.EndTime, 23) AS endTime, ISNULL(A.FaceValue, 0) AS faceValue, ISNULL(A.ContentNo, 0) AS contentNo, A.Status AS status, A.MemCode AS memCode, A.Mobile AS mobile, A.BPCode AS bpCode, B.RuleName AS ruleName, B.Description AS description, B.isGive AS isGive FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.RuleCode = B.RuleCode)

SELECT RuleCode AS ruleCode, RuleName AS ruleName, CONVERT(VARCHAR, SendStartTime, 23) AS sendStartTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, SendEndTime, 23) AS sendEndTime, Status AS status, ValidFlag AS validFlag FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
RuleName like '%'+#ruleName#+'%'
(SendEndTime IS NULL OR CONVERT(DATE, SendEndTime) >= CONVERT(DATE, #sendStartTime#))
CONVERT(DATE, SendStartTime) <= CONVERT(DATE, #sendEndTime#)
Status = #status#
ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.CounterCode AS counterCode, B.DepartName AS counterName, A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationID FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponCounterDetail A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE A.RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND A.FilterType = #filterType#
(A.CounterCode LIKE '%'+#counterKey#+'%' OR B.DepartName LIKE '%'+#counterKey#+'%')
A.ContentNo=#contentNo#
A.IsTemp=#isTemp#
AND A.ConditionType = #conditionType# AND A.IsTemp = #isTemp# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT MemCode AS memCode, Mobile AS mobile FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponMemeberDetail WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode#
(MemCode LIKE '%'+#memberKey#+'%' OR Mobile LIKE '%'+#memberKey#+'%')
AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND ValidFlag = '1'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(SORT_T1.ruleCode) AS count FROM (
)SORT_T1

SELECT BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, BIN_OrganizationInfoID AS organizationInfoId, RuleCode AS ruleCode, RuleName AS ruleName, CONVERT(VARCHAR, SendStartTime, 23) AS sendStartTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, SendEndTime, 23) AS sendEndTime, Content AS content, UseTimeJson AS useTimeJson, Description AS description, SendCond AS sendCond, UseCond AS useCond, Status AS status, SumQuantity AS sumQuantity, LimitQuantity AS limitQuantity, Quantity AS quantity, ValidMode AS validMode, isGive AS isGive, ValidFlag AS validFlag, CouponFlag AS couponFlag, ContentNoMax AS maxContentNo FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule SET RuleName = #ruleName#, SendStartTime = #sendStartTime#, SendEndTime = #sendEndTime#, Content = #content#, UseTimeJson = #useTimeJson#, Description = #description#, SendCond = #sendCond#, UseCond = #useCond#, SumQuantity = #sumQuantity#, LimitQuantity = #limitQuantity#, Quantity = #quantity#, ValidMode = #validMode#, isGive = #isGive#, CouponFlag = #couponFlag#, ContentNoMax = #maxContentNo#,
WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode#

UPDATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule SET
SendCond = #sendCond#,
UseCond = #useCond#,
WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode#

UPDATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule SET Status = '1',
WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT TOP 1 A.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AS prmVendorId, B.BarCode AS barCode FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_PromotionProductID = B.BIN_PromotionProductID) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.NameTotal = #nameTotal#

WHERE
(A.BPCode = #bpCode# OR A.MemCode = #memberCode# OR A.Mobile = #mobile#)
A.MemCode = #memberCode#
(A.MemCode = #memberCode# OR A.Mobile = #mobile# AND (A.MemCode IS NULL OR A.MemCode = ''))
A.Mobile = #mobile# AND (A.MemCode IS NULL OR A.MemCode = '')
AND CONVERT(DATE,A.StartTime) <= #saleDate# AND CONVERT(DATE,A.EndTime) >= #saleDate# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
AND A.CouponType = #couponType#
AND A.CouponType <> '2'
AND A.Status = 'AR'
WHERE A.CouponNo = #couponNo#
SELECT BIN_OrganizationID FROM Basis.BIN_Organization WHERE DepartCode = #counterCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS count FROM (
)SORT_T1

SELECT COUNT(1) AS count FROM (
)SORT_T1
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponCounterDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#isTemp#
BIN_OrganizationID=#organizationID#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponCounterDetail SET IsTemp='1' WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#isTemp#
UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail SET IsTemp='1' WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#isTemp#
UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponMemeberDetail SET IsTemp='1' WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#isTemp#

UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponCounterDetail SET IsTemp= #newIsTemp# WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#oldIsTemp#

UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail SET IsTemp= #newIsTemp# WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#oldIsTemp#

UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponMemeberDetail SET IsTemp= #newIsTemp# WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ContentNo=#contentNo# AND IsTemp=#oldIsTemp#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BIN_MemberLevelID AS levelId, A.LevelName AS levelName FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevel A JOIN Members.BIN_MemberLevelDetail B ON(A.BIN_MemberLevelID = B.BIN_MemberLevelID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponMemeberDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType#
sqlMap.select: SELECT top 1 A.BIN_ProductVendorID AS prtVendorId, A.BarCode AS barCode, B.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.NameTotal AS nameTotal FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor A JOIN Basis.BIN_Product B ON A.BIN_ProductID = B.BIN_ProductID WHERE A.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId#

SELECT top 1 ISNULL(B.SalePrice, 0) as salePrice FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor A JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductPrice B ON (A.BIN_ProductID = B.BIN_ProductID) WHERE A.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId# AND B.StartDate <= #saleDate# AND B.EndDate >= #saleDate# AND B.ValidFlag = '1'
SELECT top 1 A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS cateValId, A.PropValueCherry AS cateVal, A.PropValueChinese AS cateValName FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue A WHERE A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID = #cateValId#
SELECT ActivityName AS campName FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity WHERE ActivityCode = #campaignCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
SELECT CampaignName AS campName FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign WHERE CampaignCode = #campaignCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
SELECT RuleName AS campName FROM promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule WHERE RuleCode = #campaignCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
SELECT OrgCode, BrandCode, DataSourceName FROM dbo.BIN_BrandDataSourceConfig WHERE ValidFlag = '1' AND OrgCode <> '-9999' AND BrandCode <> '-9999'

SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID, B.BIN_BrandInfoID FROM Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo A, Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B WHERE A.OrgCode = #orgCode# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = B.BIN_OrganizationInfoID AND B.BrandCode = #brandCode# AND B.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT RuleCode AS ruleCode, RuleName AS ruleName, CONVERT(VARCHAR, SendStartTime, 23) AS sendStartTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, SendEndTime, 23) AS sendEndTime, Content AS content, UseTimeJson AS useTimeJson, SendCond AS sendCond, UseCond AS useCond, ISNULL(SumQuantity, 0) AS sumQuantity, ISNULL(LimitQuantity, 0) AS limitQuantity, ISNULL(Quantity, 0) AS quantity, ValidMode AS validMode, isGive AS isGive, ISNULL(ModifyCount, 0) AS modifyCount FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND Status = '1' AND ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY RuleCode DESC

SELECT A.RuleCode AS ruleCode, A.RuleName AS ruleName, CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.SendStartTime, 23) AS sendStartTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.SendEndTime, 23) AS sendEndTime, A.Content AS content, A.UseTimeJson AS useTimeJson, A.SendCond AS sendCond, A.UseCond AS useCond, ISNULL(A.SumQuantity, 0) AS sumQuantity, ISNULL(A.LimitQuantity, 0) AS limitQuantity, ISNULL(A.Quantity, 0) AS quantity, A.ValidMode AS validMode, A.isGive AS isGive, ISNULL(A.ModifyCount, 0) AS modifyCount, B.BrandCode AS brandCode, C.OrgCode AS orgCode FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionCouponRule A JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B ON(A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) JOIN Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo C ON(B.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = C.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) WHERE A.RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND A.Status = '1' AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponCounterDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND CounterCode = #counterCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ValidFlag = '1' AND IsTemp = '1'
ContentNo = #contentNo#

SELECT PrtObjId AS prtVendorId, PrtObjNum AS proNum FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND PrtObjType = '1' AND ValidFlag = '1' AND IsTemp = '1'
ContentNo = #contentNo#

SELECT PrtObjId AS cateValId, PrtObjNum AS cateNum FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND PrtObjType = '2' AND ValidFlag = '1' AND IsTemp = '1'
ContentNo = #contentNo#

SELECT PrtObjId FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND PrtObjType = '1' AND ValidFlag = '1' AND IsTemp = '1'
ContentNo = #contentNo#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponMemeberDetail WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND FilterType = #filterType# AND ConditionType = #conditionType# AND (MemCode = #memCode# OR Mobile = #mobile#) AND ValidFlag = '1' AND IsTemp = '1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon WHERE RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND
(MemCode = #memCode# OR Mobile = #mobile#) AND
(BPCode = #bpCode# OR Mobile = #mobile#) AND
ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT RuleCode AS maincode, CouponType AS ruleType FROM [Promotion].[BIN_MemberCoupon] where CouponNo in
#couponList[].couponCode#
SELECT B.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS prtCateId FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor A, Basis.BIN_PrtCategory B WHERE A.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId# AND A.BIN_ProductID = B.BIN_ProductID
SELECT BIN_MemberLevelID AS levelId FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevel WHERE LevelCode = #levelCode#

SELECT BIN_MemberLevelID AS levelId, LevelName AS levelName FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevel WHERE BIN_MemberLevelID in
#levelArr[]#
SELECT CouponType FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon WHERE CouponNo = #couponNo#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Promotion.BIN_CouponSmsRecord SET Zstatus = #zstatus#,
WHERE BIN_CouponSmsID = #couponSmsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CouponNo as couponNo, CouponCode as couponCode FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# and BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# and RelatedNoA=#tradeNoIF#
SELECT BIN_CouponSmsID FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponSmsRecord WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE RelatedNo=#tradeNoIF# and Mobile=#mobile# and MemCode=#memCode# and Zstatus >0

SELECT CouponNo as couponNo, CouponCode as couponCode, CouponType as couponType, cast(FaceValue as int) as faceValue, STUFF(STUFF(CONVERT(char(8),Starttime,112),5,0,N'年'),8,0,N'月')+N'日' as startTime, STUFF(STUFF(CONVERT(char(8),EndTime,112),5,0,N'年'),8,0,N'月')+N'日' as endTime FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon WHERE couponNo IN
#couponArr[]#

SELECT 'Q'+CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),B.BIN_ChannelID) AS channelId, B.ChannelName AS name, 'D'+CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),A.BIN_OrganizationID) AS memCounterId, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName, A.CounterCode AS counterCode FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A with(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel B with(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_ChannelID=B.BIN_ChannelID AND B.ValidFlag=1) WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoId = #organizationInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = 1
SELECT top 1 A.BIN_ChannelID as channelId FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A with(NOLOCK) WHERE A.CounterCode = #counterCode#

SELECT failJson FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY failJson) AS RowNumber, failJson FROM (

SELECT RuleCode AS ruleCode, ConditionType AS conditionType, FilterType AS filterType, PrtObjType AS prtObjType, PrtObjId AS prtObjId, PrtObjNum AS prtObjNum, ContentNo AS contentNo, P.UnitCode AS unitCode, P.NameTotal AS nameTotal, PV.BarCode AS barCode
FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail PCPD WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor PV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PCPD.PrtObjId = PV.BIN_ProductVendorID JOIN Basis.BIN_Product P WITH(NOLOCK) ON PV.BIN_ProductID = P.BIN_ProductID WHERE PCPD.RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND PCPD.ConditionType = #conditionType# AND PCPD.FilterType = #filterType# AND PCPD.ContentNo = #contentNo#

SELECT RuleCode AS ruleCode, ConditionType AS conditionType, FilterType AS filterType, PrtObjType AS prtObjType, PrtObjId AS prtObjId, PrtObjNum AS prtObjNum, ContentNo AS contentNo, P.UnitCode AS unitCode, P.NameTotal AS nameTotal, PV.BarCode AS barCode
FROM Promotion.BIN_CouponProductDetail PCPD WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor PV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PCPD.PrtObjId = PV.BIN_ProductVendorID JOIN Basis.BIN_Product P WITH(NOLOCK) ON PV.BIN_ProductID = P.BIN_ProductID WHERE PCPD.RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND PCPD.ConditionType = #conditionType# AND PCPD.FilterType = #filterType# AND PCPD.ContentNo = #contentNo#
PCPD.IsTemp = #isTemp#

WHERE PCPD.RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND PCPD.ConditionType = #conditionType# AND PCPD.FilterType = #filterType# AND PCPD.PrtObjType = #prtObjType# AND PCPD.ContentNo = #contentNo#

sqlMap.insert: insert Promotion.BIN_CouponCounterDetail (RuleCode,BIN_OrganizationID,CounterCode,ConditionType,FilterType,ContentNo,IsTemp,UpdateTime,UpdatedBy,UpdatePGM,CreateTime,CreatedBy,CreatePGM ,ModifyCount,ValidFlag) ( select #ruleCode# as RuleCode, BIN_OrganizationID as BIN_OrganizationID, DepartCode as CounterCode, #conditionType# as ConditionType, #filterType# as FilterType, #contentNo# as ContentNo, #isTemp# as IsTemp, GETDATE() as UpdateTime, GETDATE() as UpdatedBy, 'BINOLSSPRM73' as UpdatePGM, GETDATE() as CreateTime, 'BINOLSSPRM73' as CreatedBy, 'BINOLSSPRM73' as CreatePGM, '0' as ModifyCount, '1' as ValidFlag from Basis.BIN_Organization where BIN_OrganizationID=#organizationID# )
